snippet: The CFDA-award-winning designer is about to introduce an affordable collection of basics for the style-conscious big-box retailer, consisting of everything from socks to vinyl jackets.
abstract: The CFDA-award-winning designer is about to introduce an affordable collection of basics for the style-conscious big-box retailer, consisting of everything from socks to vinyl jackets.

headline.main: Phillip Lim's Stylish Everyday Wardrobe for Target
